name: Death Zone (Editions Fermont)
overview: The alien fleet commanded by General Jhon Benson is doing everything to invade the earth. Fortunately, we earthlings have a deadly weapon, an exceptional laser cannon that you will have to maneuver using your joystick controls. The aliens are very numerous so it all comes down to your ability to eliminate them. Pay special attention to the multicolored spaceships which are among the most dangerous. Published as Death Star in Italy's Nova Games n.31 (Maggio 1989).
